text:
If one create virtual host using /host-manager application all work as expected. Start/Stop/Remove actions.
But newly created host is not persistently added to the Tomcat configuration.
After restart of Tomcat there is only localhost host listed.
creator: pskopek@gmail.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 48674 ***
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
